metadata.title: USN-5198-1 -- HTMLDOC vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that HTMLDOC improperly handled malformed URIs from an input html file.  An attacker could use this to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5198-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  htmldoc - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.2 htmldoc-common - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
